block.p: Lynne Sharon Schwartz (Lives, June 4) can have her fun and still get her work done. Here's how I limit the amount of time I spend playing solitaire on the computer: I use Las Vegas scoring, which sells me the deck for $52 and pays me $5 for each card I play on top. I give myself a gambling loss limit (usually $100) and I stop playing once my losses exceed it. Well, sometimes I ''find'' another $100 and keep going, but the method forces me to exercise self-control.
